text: 6:10 Ua Me Ini 23:8; Godɨn Araziba 16:19; Efesus 5:5Ezɨ dagɨabagh ifongezir arazim, an arazir kurar guar avɨribar mɨngarim. Gumazamizir maba dagɨaba baghavɨra ifonge, ezɨ arazir kam me gamima, me uan nɨghnɨzir gavgaviba ataghɨrasi. Egha me osɨmtɨzir kurar ekiam isa, mati afuzim navim okoregha vongɨn oto.
